authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby George C. Stebbins

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Calling today, calling today,
Jesus is calling,
Is tenderly calling today.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is tenderly calling thee home
Calling today, calling today.
Why from the sunshine
Of love wilt thou roam
Farther and farther away?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is calling the weary to rest
Calling today, calling today.
Bring Him your burden
And you shall be blest;
He will not turn you away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is waiting; O come to Him now
Waiting today waiting today.
Come with your sins; at His feet lowly bow,
Come and no longer delay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus is pleading; O list to His voice
Hear Him today, hear Him today.
They who believe on His name shall rejoice.
Quickly arise and away.
